attributes.review: It seriously took forever to download and Once I opened it something happened to my phone. Like it froze everything, I couldn’t do anything on my phone for hours literally this app is evil. I had to go to the repair shop to get my phone fixed thanks a lot.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! TERRIBLE

attributes.review: what is wrong with you if you actually support this dumb orange looking old man. All he has done is cause trouble, why in the world would you want to download this trashy app. Just don’t do it it’s a waste of time. They should remove this immediately!! Someone better bring Obama back.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: LITERALLY THE WORST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED!!!!! it was laggy it was filled with viruses and it literally broke my phone, i had to buy a new one just to come back and GIVE THIS GARBAGE APP 1 star DISGUSTING also late at night I got a notification from it saying that it has all my data and it’s gonna sell it to Russia ??? NO ❤️
attributes.title: This ones for the boys n the booming system

attributes.review: This app is the worst I ever had to deal with, I got it on my iPad and now I can’t use it because it won’t turn on anymore. I am just mad at the campaign who made this app because it is horrible. If u get this app watch out it will probably break your device.
attributes.title: Do not get

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, I started receiving anonymous calls from China, like 30 calls a day. It also automatically added every single Kid Rock album ever made to my Apple Music account, and began playing them every hour, on the hour. Don’t get this!
attributes.title: Bad. Very bad.

attributes.review: upon opening the app I received nude photos of trump! I cannot believe my own president has a shrimp!! I was going to vote for him but I just cant with these shrimps acting like they can take over our country. he looks like a frog too. girl its the obseity for me. stop playing and get help 💜
attributes.title: Absolutely Flabbergasted!

attributes.review:
I absolutely hate this app.
It took 1 week to download, and I sat there for 1 week starring at my phone no food. No water.
I haven’t seen daylight in 2 weeks.
This app is racist, and homophobic.
It asked so my MOBILE phone number.
I cannot believe they even said that about me! 
It was so rude.
I literally just wanted to download the app because I wanted to see everything about it.
Turns out it was DISCUSTANG
Do not download 
Very bad
Bad app
Smelly
Hate it
Fishy stanky
It made me watch that one 404 video on the internet. I’m not ok with this app at all. I hate it! 
App bad.
attributes.title: DISCUSTANG.

attributes.review: I had to delete this app RIGHT AWAY! If you read the terms and conditions, it basically says they can steal and take all of your information! Don’t want that. Deleting it right away. Privacy is my right and I don’t want to share any of it with this POTUS.
attributes.title: They’re watching us!!!!

attributes.review: Trump is an awful President, we as people shouldn’t allow him anymore help in spreading his stupidity. Highlight his racist, sexist, and corrupt personality rather than a stupid app, which, was slow, lagged, and tried to hack my info! A terrible app for a terrible President. Take this app off stores and him out of office.
attributes.title: Worst app for the worst President

attributes.review: I’m completely and utterly disappointed by this app. It is absolutely the worst app I’ve ever downloaded in my entire life. If I could I would rate it 0 stars, it deserves to be completely erased from the App Store all together. I wouldn’t even recommend this app to my worst enemy. This app is trash.:(
attributes.title: Worst app ever
